name: Basic Plan
features: Access to gym during off-peak hours
Access to basic cardio and weight equipment

name: Standard Plan
features: Access to all cardio and weight equipment

name: Premium Plan
features: One free personal training session per month
Access to sauna and steam room

name: Couple's Plan
features: Unlimited access to gym for two people
Two free personal training sessions per month
Access to sauna and steam room

name: Family Plan
features: Unlimited access to gym for up to 4 family members
Four free personal training sessions per month
Access to sauna and steam room

name: Annual Membership
features: Access to all facilities including sauna and steam room
Discount on merchandise and additional services
